title: ‘My needles are waiting’: USA’s Ben Ogden credits knitting habit after cross-country silver
desc: The Vermont native’s silver medal in the sprint continues a run of strong performances for Americans in cross-country skiing

title: Brennan trying to 'rattle a few cages', says McCarthy
desc: Dublin great James McCarthy isn't convinced that new boss Ger Brennan is about to wield the axe on a group of household names, suggesting that the threat of being dropped was merely a "subtle message" delivered through the media.

title: Ahmed Farah appointed as Executive Director of East African Business Council
desc: Ahmed Farah has been appointed as the new Executive Director of the East African Business Council (EABC), following a recruitment process conducted by the Council’s Executive Board.

title: Microsleep leads to m-cyclist being killed in Melaka, say cops
desc: Melaka Tengah police chief Christopher Patit says the crash was triggered when a Perodua Myvi driver apparently fell asleep momentarily and veered into the opposite lane.

title: Malinowski Concedes to Mejia, a Progressive Activist, in New Jersey Race
desc: Tom Malinowski, who was battered by negative advertising, congratulated Analilia Mejia, a political organizer running for Gov. Mikie Sherrill’s vacant seat in Congress, on a “hard-won victory.”

title: CHOP, Penn Medicine Unveil Tactics to Curb S. Aureus in NICU
desc: Philadelphia, February 10, 2026 – A new study led by researchers at Children's Hospital of Philadelphia (CHOP) and the University of Pennsylvania

title: Gaza girls take up boxing to heal war's scars
desc: In a makeshift boxing ring etched into the sand between the tens of displaced Palestinians in southern Gaza, a dozen young girls warmed up before delivering fierce blows at their coach's command.

title: 'Brilliant' to have Furlong back
desc: Tadhg Furlong trained fully with the Ireland squad on Tuesday and is expected to come into the team to face Italy on Saturday.

title: Back pocket clarity: A notebook in a world of code
desc: NIGHT OWLThere’s a particular relief that arrives the moment you open a notebook. Not the productivity kind—the “look at me, I’m organized” kind—but...

title: 12 launch to Friday amid weather concerns
desc: Elevated winds have pushed NASA and SpaceX's Crew-12 launch from Cape Canaveral to the International Space Station from Thursday to Friday.
